about_the_game:
PRESENTATION


Today is going to be the happiest day of young Celestine's life.
Indeed, she's going to marry Prince Simon William Barry Dermott O'Sharrock the VI, born twenty years ago on the first day of Summer (which foretells prosperity, according to the tales!).
But as she flaunts her gorgeous wedding dress in the hallways of the palace, Celestine doesn't realize the worst is about to happen.
Cersei, Heiress of Noctopolis, is determined not to let this ceremony go through, and mere minutes before the union, the poor helpless bride can do nothing but witness in tears the abduction of her Prince!
Is this the end?
True love knows no limit, and Celestine, quickly joined by a grumpy old Knight, is about to live an adventure she would only have imagined in her wildest dreams - or nightmares!

Celestine, by the makers of Final Battle, features an enthralling story with many twists and turns, and a gameplay to satisfy the itch of RPG players.
It is a must-have for fans of the old Final Fantasy, Dragon Quest and Breath of Fire.

CONTROLS



To move characters and the cursor, use the directional buttons on the game pad or the arrow keys on the keyboard.

  • ENTER/SPACE: Confirm, OK, Enter
  • ESC: Cancel, Menu
  • PAGE UP: Previous page
  • PAGE DOWN: Next page

If you're playing with the mouse:

  • LEFT-CLICK: Move characters, Confirm, OK, Enter
  • RIGHT-CLICK: Cancel, Menu


  • ALT+ENTER: Switches between window mode and full-screen mode.
  • ALT+F4: Forcibly exits the game.
  • F12: Forcibly returns to the title screen.
